description: Detects the execution of a renamed ProcDump executable often used by attackers or malware Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Procdump illegaly bundled with legitimate software
name: Renamed ProcDump
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"procdump" OR (process.command_line:*\ \-ma\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-accepteula\ *)) OR (process.command_line:*\ \-ma\ * AND process.command_line:*.dmp*)) AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\procdump.exe OR *\\procdump64.exe))))
